Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

Class LoggerCore

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger.LoggerCoreMethods
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger.LoggerCore
public class LoggerCore extends dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger.LoggerCoreMethods
Platform-agnostic logger core with configurable formatting and placeholders.

      Create a logger core instance.
      Parameters:
      platform - platform adapter
      configManager - config manager
      placeholderOwner - owner key for local placeholders
      pluginName - plugin/mod name for prefix defaults

    • resolveColorsForLevel

      public String[] resolveColorsForLevel(LogLevel level, boolean forConsole)
      Resolves colors for the specified log level directly from the active configuration. Falls back to built-in defaults if the configuration isn't available yet.
      Parameters:
      level - log level being rendered
      forConsole - true to use console palette, false for chat palette
      Returns:
      array of colors representing a gradient for the given level/target
